escode_title: Escode - Redefining Software Escrow. A product of the NCC Group
escode_description: Escode is a SaaS platform that redefines the way software escrow is done. Its secure hosted solution provides a safe and reliable way to protect your software assets. Currently, I am working on the Frontend, ensuring a seamless and intuitive user experience.
